```{r}
# network enrichment plotting
lh_spin_df <- data.frame(read.table('Y:/data/lh_spin_test_TaskEf_proportions.csv', sep = ","))
rh_spin_df <- data.frame(read.table('Y:/data/rh_spin_test_TaskEf_proportions.csv', sep = ","))
```

```{r}
actual_results <- (lh_spin_df[,1] + rh_spin_df[,1])/2
spin_without_target_col <- cbind(lh_spin_df[,2:1001],rh_spin_df[,2:1001])
pvec=NULL
for (i in 1:7){
    #store p values
    pvec[i]=(length(which(spin_without_target_col[i,] > actual_results[i]))/2000)
}
```
